experience.name: Krowdy
experience.summary: Krowdy is a Human Resources company specialized in automating recruitment processes. My functions were to build landing pages and forms, upload banners, update and implement new features in Laborum's platform and send mass mailings.

experience.name: Devant
experience.summary: Devant is a group of developers committed to devising technology solutions for various companies. As a freelance, I was in charge of the implementation of forms for the medication of cancer patients for the biotech company Roche.

experience.name: Minsky
experience.summary: Minsky is a development group dedicated to creating technology solutions. My role at Minsky was to build interfaces and put together the business logic for the companies that worked with Minsky.

experience.name: Destacame
experience.summary: Destacame is a well-positioned Fintech in Chile that provides various benefits to its customers. My main role consists in the improvement and maintenance of the different projects it has with Santander Bank, as well as bug fixing, code refactoring, and process optimization with the help of cloud technologies.
